originalText.text:
As a parent, finding the right soccer coach for your child is incredibly important. I highly recommend Coach Walter for any parent looking for an exceptional soccer coach for their child. His passion for soccer is evident in every session, and he consistently goes above and beyond, often dedicating more time than scheduled to ensure each lesson is impactful.

His extensive experience in both playing and training shines through in his methodology. He possesses a unique knack for teaching kids new moves with patience and clarity, ensuring they grasp every nuance. What truly sets him apart is his ability to motivate and encourage in a manner that builds confidence and fosters a genuine love for the game.

Under Coach Walter's supervision, my son's soccer skills (dribbling, shooting, 1 vs 1 plays, etc) have grown very fast.

Besides, Coach Walter is also an accomplished artist. The fusion of art with soccer offers a uniquely engaging teaching perspective, making every lesson memorable.

originalText.text: Coach Walter is very professional, patient and great with kids. Both of my kids have been learning soccer with him for a long time, and they enjoy practice with Coach Walter a lot! The practice is well designed and with the right capacity, it’s great for young soccer players to explore the sports and progress!

The practice is well designed and with the right capacity, it’s great for young soccer players to explore the sports and progress!

originalText.text:
Coach Walter and his "Jouk" team have been a complete game-changer for my 5 yo. From the very first session, it was evident that Coach Walter is not just a skilled coach, but also a mentor to the kids. His passion for the sport and contagious energy are what keep the kids motivated, engaged and always striving to improve. The team atmosphere is one of positivity, encouragement, and support, and I can see the impact it has had on my child's confidence and skills on the field.

Coach Walter has a unique ability to connect with each player, and he personalizes his coaching methods to ensure everyone is learning and improving. It's inspiring to watch the progress each child makes under coach Walter's guidance, and I'm blown away by how much my boy has grown both on and off the field.

If you're looking for an exceptional soccer coach and team for your young ones, look no further than "Jouk" team.

PS: The summer session in Central Park with Coach Walter was just awesome! The kids had a great time playing and learning in the beautiful outdoor setting.

originalText.text: My son loves Coach Walter. He is very patient and good at communicating with and motivating the kids. Joük soccer’s training is well organized and kids not only actually learn the techniques but also have a lot of fun doing so! Coach Walter is really great at getting the kids enthusiastic about soccer and keeping them engaged, even those who may be hesitant or reluctant to play!

originalText.text: Coach Walter is amazing with children. This is probably the best and most important thing about his soccer program. There are many options for soccer on the Upper East Side and I have tried a few. None have compared when it comes to having a firm, but very caring coach. My daughter and her classmates have worked with Coach Walter for 2 years and they all look forward to his class every week. I can’t say enough nice things about Coach Walter and the program he has created!
